name: Planet Protector (Trialblazer)
description:
This game called Planet Protector and it was made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #2. The theme of this game jam was mini planets, So in this game you have to protect a small version of Earth.

Disclaimer:
This game is for the Blackthornprod Game Jam and will most likely not be getting updates unless I think that the game is good enough for more.
There is no difference in story mode except how speeds change and sound effects
